name: Senior Business analyst
description:
Responsibilities:

  • To provide business analysis within the implementation of new processes and IT systems
  • To describe and optimize business processes, creating procedures and instructions for new tools and trainings where applicable
  • To participate in project activities as a lead business analyst in one or more functional areas. To coordinate, document and control the tasks given in work streams for project activity within assigned scope
  • To work on the implementation of new business processes and IT systems cross functionally representing the process
  • To provide users trainings and consultancy about processes changes and issues, including maintenance of such documentation
  • Identification of key issues and process development opportunities

Requirements:

  • Higher education, preferable sphere - Process Engineering or Technical

  • Upper-Intermediate level in English or higher (spoken and written)

  • 5 years of work experience in implementation, and/or development of systems/projects

  • Project and Process management tools (i.e. EPC, BPMN, IDEF, UML, MS Project, MS Teams, etc)
  • Work experience with IT systems (databases, web programming, data processing systems) and requirement gathering.

We offer:

  • Work in the leading international multi-brand company
  • Young, friendly and international team
  • Opportunities for career development
  • Social benefits (insurance, meals, partners' discounts etc.)
